sharedAttributes.Gateway connector:
{
  "master": {
    "slaves": [
      {
        "name": "Main intake valve",
        "host": "host.docker.internal",
        "port": 5021,
        "type": "tcp",
        "method": "socket",
        "timeout": 3,
        "byteOrder": "BIG",
        "wordOrder": "LITTLE",
        "retries": true,
        "retryOnEmpty": true,
        "retryOnInvalid": true,
        "pollPeriod": 1000,
        "unitId": 1,
        "deviceName": "Main intake valve",
        "deviceType": "default",
        "reportStrategy": {
          "type": "ON_CHANGE_OR_REPORT_PERIOD",
          "reportPeriod": 30000
        },
        "connectAttemptTimeMs": 3000,
        "connectAttemptCount": 3,
        "waitAfterFailedAttemptsMs": 30000,
        "attributes": [],
        "timeseries": [
          {
            "tag": "opened",
            "type": "bits",
            "functionCode": 1,
            "objectsCount": 8,
            "address": 0,
            "bit": 7
          }
        ],
        "attributeUpdates": [],
        "rpc": [
          {
            "tag": "setOpened",
            "type": "bits",
            "functionCode": 5,
            "objectsCount": 1,
            "address": 0
          }
        ]
      },
